lastfm.summary: "Virtual Insanity" is a song by British funk and acid jazz band Jamiroquai, released on 19 August 1996 by Sony Soho Square as the second single from their third studio album, Travelling Without Moving. The song was written by Jay Kay and Toby Smith, and produced by Al Stone. Its award-winning music video, directed by Jonathan Glazer, was released in September 1996, garnering ten nominations and winning four, including for "Video of the Year", at the 1997 MTV Video Music Awards. The music video has since become an Internet meme. Read more on Last.fm.
lastfm.title: Virtual Insanity
